import React from 'react'; const Controls = ({ algorithm, onAlgorithmChange, mode, onModeChange, lineInputs, circleInputs, onInputChange, selectedPoints, onDraw, onClear, onCompareAll }) => { const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); onDraw(); }; const isLineMode = mode === 'line'; const needsPoints = isLineMode ? selectedPoints.length < 2 : selectedPoints.length < 2; const canDraw = !needsPoints || true; // allow inputs even without points return (
{isLineMode ? (
onInputChange('line', 'x1', parseFloat(e.target.value) || 0)} />
onInputChange('line', 'y1', parseFloat(e.target.value) || 0)} />
onInputChange('line', 'x2', parseFloat(e.target.value) || 0)} />
onInputChange('line', 'y2', parseFloat(e.target.value) || 0)} />
) : (
onInputChange('circle', 'xc', parseFloat(e.target.value) || 0)} />
onInputChange('circle', 'yc', parseFloat(e.target.value) || 0)} />
onInputChange('circle', 'r', parseFloat(e.target.value) || 0)} />
)}
Выбранные точки: {selectedPoints.map((point, idx) => (
P{idx + 1}: ({point[0]}, {point[1]})
))} {needsPoints &&
Кликните на canvas для выбора точек
}
); }; export default Controls;
